mapper.select: SELECT c.car_id, c.model_id, c.car_category, c.car_status, c.car_year, c.car_fuel, c.car_grade, c.car_options, c.rental_station, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_seate_num, m.model_transmission, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day, p.parking_id, p.parking_name, p.parking_province, p.parking_district FROM car c JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id WHERE p.parking_province = #{province} AND p.parking_district = #{district} ORDER BY c.car_id;

SELECT c.car_id, c.car_grade, c.car_category, c.car_status, c.car_options, c.car_fuel, c.car_year, m.model_id, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_transmission, m.model_seate_num, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day, p.parking_id, p.parking_name, p.parking_province, p.parking_district FROM car c LEFT JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id WHERE c.car_id = #{carId};
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET model_id = #{modelId}, car_category = #{carCategory}, car_status = #{carStatus}, car_year = #{carYear}, car_fuel = #{carFuel}, car_grade = #{carGrade}, car_options = #{carOptions}, rental_station = #{parking.parkingId} WHERE car_id = #{carId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (model_id, car_category, car_status, car_year, car_fuel, car_grade, car_options, rental_station) VALUES (#{modelId}, #{carCategory}, #{carStatus}, #{carYear}, #{carFuel}, #{carGrade}, #{carOptions}, #{parking.parkingId});
mapper.select: SELECT car.car_grade AS category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM car GROUP BY car.car_grade
SELECT model.model_name AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM car JOIN model ON car.model_id = model.model_id GROUP BY model.model_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT model.model_brand AS manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS count FROM car JOIN model ON car.model_id = model.model_id GROUP BY model.model_brand
